name: Paradise Peril
description:
Play Link:

https://launch.crayta.com/play/9xru8eh6

Entry for November's Dream Vacation Game Jam.

What started off as a day in Paradise became a warzone, turning a normally relaxing beach complex into a fight for survival. Pick up weapons and fight your way to victory!

Footnote:

Had a few other plans for this but time got the better of me and there were quite a features missing. One day perhaps I will revisit if the game jam restrictions are lifted, keep an eye on the game on Crayta for updates.
